courseName: International Seminar on European Project Management
description: International Seminar on European Project ManagementOBJECTIVE AND TARGET GROUPSThe objective of the International Seminar in European Project Management is to provide participants with the skills to successfully manage European projects, monitor their correct implementation and successfully achieve the expected results.The international seminar is addressed to in-service staff working in:- public bodies- universities- schools
modality: PGDip, MA, PGCert, PGCE, Masters Module, Other, MSc, MBA, EMBA, IMBA
fees: FeesThe enrollment fee is 640 euro per person. Groups composed of at least 6 participants will benefit of a 25% reduction of the enrolment fee
